SEARCH
Package helper

Class Helper

Object
Helper
public class Helper extends Object
The Helper class provides utility methods for reading user input, parsing CSV-formatted strings, and other helper functions.
Since:
2024-10-27
Version:
7.6
Author:
Goh Jun Keat

  • Method Details

    • readString

      public static String readString()
      Reads a line of text input from the user.
      Returns:
      The user's input as a String.

    • pauseApplication

      public static void pauseApplication()
      Pauses the application and waits for the user to press Enter to continue.

    • readInt

      public static int readInt()
      Repeatedly tries to read an integer until an integer is read. Keeps catching the exception InputMismatchException when input others than integer is entered.
      Returns:
      The integer entered by the user.

    • readChar

      public static char readChar()
      Reads a single character input from the user and converts it to lowercase.
      Returns:
      The first character of the user's input, in lowercase.

    • clearInputBuffer

      public static void clearInputBuffer()
      Clears any remaining input in the input buffer.

    • parseCSVLine

      public static List<String> parseCSVLine(String line)
      Parses a line of CSV data, handling quoted fields with commas.
      Parameters:
      line - A line of CSV-formatted text.
      Returns:
      A list of fields as strings, separated by commas in the original input.

    • parseList

      public static List<String> parseList(String field)
      Parses a quoted, comma-separated string field into a list of strings.
      Parameters:
      field - A string field containing items separated by commas, possibly quoted.
      Returns:
      A list of strings parsed from the input field.

    • validEmailAddress

      public static boolean validEmailAddress(String emailAddress)
      Validates an email address against a regular expression pattern
      Parameters:
      emailAddress - the email address to be validated
      Returns:
      true if the email address is valid else false

    • getMaxIDByRole

      public static int getMaxIDByRole(Role role)
      Retrieves the maximum staff ID for a given role. This method iterates through all users in the database, checks their role, and extracts the numeric part of their ID (excluding the prefix). It then returns the highest ID found for the specified role.
      Parameters:
      role - the role for which to retrieve the maximum ID
      Returns:
      the maximum staff ID for the given role
      See Also:
      • Role
      • User.getID()
